id.comment: Queries 1 - 3 - Test Follows relation. Nested stmt that is followed - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 10)

id.comment: Nested stmt that follows - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(16, s)

id.comment: Select all stmt that follows - true

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; Select s such that Follows(s1, s)

id.comment: Queries 4 - 6 - Test Follows* relation. Nested stmt that is followed* - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 8)

id.comment: Nest stmt that follows* - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(15, s)

id.comment: Select all stmt that followed* by - true

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; Select s such that Follows*(s, s1)

id.comment: Queries 7 - 9 - Test Parent relation. Select all parent stmt - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s, _)

id.comment: Select all child stmt - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(_, s)

id.comment: Select stmt type that is child of 0 nested parent - true

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Parent(3, r)

id.comment: Queries 10 - 12 - Test Parent* relation. Select all parent* stmt of 2nd nested child* - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s, 17)

id.comment: Select all child* stmt of 0 nested parent* - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(14, s)

id.comment: Select stmt type that is child* of 0 nested parent* - true

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Parent*(3, r)

id.comment: Queries 13 - 15 - Test Uses relation. assign modified and used - true

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses(a, "z")

id.comment: Select all stmt that uses a variable - true

query.querystr: stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Uses(s, v)

id.comment: Select all variable that is used - true

query.querystr: variable v; stmt s; Select v such that Uses(s, v)

id.comment: Queries 16 - 18 - Test Modifies relation. assign used and modified - true

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a, "z")

id.comment: Select all stmt that modifies a variable - true

query.querystr: stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Modifies(s, v)

id.comment: Select all variable that is modified - true

query.querystr: stmt s; variable v; Select v such that Modifies(s, v)

id.comment: Queries 19 - 21 - Test pattern assign relation. Select any assign that fits - true

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Select all assign that fits - true

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _"start"_)

id.comment: Select variables that fit - false

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"why"_)

id.comment: Queries 22 - 33 - Test s.t. and p.a. combinations for each s.t. clause, Select result is related to both clauses, both return results but merge will be true or fail. Follows and pattern assign - merge true

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select a such that Follows(s, a) pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Follows and pattern assign - merge fail

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select a such that Follows(s, a) pattern a(_, _"start"_)

id.comment: Follows* and pattern assign - merge true

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select a such that Follows*(a, s) pattern a("start", _)

id.comment: Follows* and pattern assign - merge fail

query.querystr: assign a; read r; Select a such that Follows*(a, r) pattern a(_, _"mid"_)

id.comment: Parent and pattern assign - merge true

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select a such that Parent(w, a) pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Parent and pattern assign - merge fail

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a such that Parent(w, a) pattern a("z", _)

id.comment: Parent* and pattern assign - merge true

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a pattern a(_, _) such that Parent*(w, a)

id.comment: Parent* and pattern assign - merge fail

query.querystr: assign a; if ifs; Select a such that Parent*(ifs, a) pattern a("mid", _"max"_)

id.comment: Uses and pattern assign - merge true

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; print pn; Select v such that Uses(pn, v) pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Uses and pattern assign - merge fail

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"max"_) such that Uses(a, "z")

id.comment: Modifies and pattern assign - merge true

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; read r; Select v such that Modifies(r, v) pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Modifies and pattern assign - merge fail

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; read r; Select v such that Modifies(r, v) pattern a(v, _"max"_)
